publicationVenue.name: Conference on Innovative Data Systems Research

title: VOCAL: Video Organization and Interactive Compositional AnaLytics
abstract: Current video database management systems (VDBMSs) fail to support the growing number of video datasets in diverse domains because these systems assume clean data and rely on pretrained models to detect known objects or actions. Existing systems also lack good support for compositional queries that seek events consisting of multiple objects with complex spatial and temporal relationships. In this paper, we propose VOCAL, a vision of a VDBMS that supports efficient data cleaning, exploration and organization, and compositional queries, even when no pretrained model exists to extract semantic content. These techniques utilize optimizations to minimize the manual effort required of users.
venue: Conference on Innovative Data Systems Research
